name: Draco Meteor
description: You summon forth a meteor shower that rains down onto the battlefield. All creatures in a 20 foot circle, centered on a point within range, must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 5d4 + MOVE dragon damage on a hit, or half as much on a save. After activating this move, your next attack is rolled at disadvantage. If that attack requires a saving throw, the target has advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d10 at level 5, 5d8 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: A very appealing move, but after using this move, the user is more easily startled.
